comment: I have some worries about the vaccination because of some information on the internet. So I made a little questionnaire to put my idea into practice.
amr:

(m / multi-sentence
      :snt1 (h / have-03

            :ARG1 (w / worry-01
                  :ARG0 (v / vaccinate-01)

                  :mod (l / little))

comment: Ditto. I got mine this morning as well Rebecca. But I had to cancel. Don't worry, I have already had my first vaccine.
